translations: v.编辑，校订；编选；剪辑；主编

sentences.sentence: He undertook to edit the text himself.
You can download the file and edit it on your word processor.
sentences.translation: 你可以把文件下载，用文字处理系统做编辑。

sentences.sentence: I had time to do a quick edit of my essay before handing it in.
sentences.translation: 我呈交论文之前有点时间，很快地校订了一遍。
